stepAnswer: The amount of A is $$72$$ moles and B is $$6$$ moles
stepTitle: A reaction mixture initially contains $$78$$ mol A and $$0$$ mol B in a $$1$$ L container. The mixture was allowed to reach equilibrium at 298K.
stepBody: Which statement is true when the equilibrium is established:
answerLatex: The amount of A is $$72$$ moles and B is $$6$$ moles
choices: The amount of A is $$6$$ moles and B is $$72$$ moles
The amount of A is $$72$$ moles and B is $$6$$ moles
The amount of A is $$39$$ moles and B is $$39$$ moles
